task.title: Browsing Audio Chunks
task.shortdesc: View and select audio chunks for slice creation.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Audio Workbench page.
step.info: From the left sidebar, click Audio SlicerLoad Source.

step.cmd: Use the filter to select a drama or episode.
Click on a chunk card to open it in the Audio Slicer.

result.p: The waveform is displayed and you can begin creating slices.
